summary: Completed comprehensive frontend styling verification for FoundersLib 'old money' aesthetic refactoring. All pages tested show proper glass effects, serif fonts (Cormorant Garamond), gold accents (#b8860b), and responsive design. Theme toggle works correctly between light and dark modes.
passed_tests: Landing page - Hero section with serif fonts and gold accents
Landing page - Hero animation with orbiting investor cards (desktop)
Landing page - Mobile stats shown instead of animation on mobile
Landing page - Features section with glass effect cards
Landing page - Dashboard preview animation
Landing page - Testimonials section with glass cards
Landing page - CTA section with centered glass card
Landing page - Footer with proper styling
Login page - Centered auth card with glass effect
Login page - Form fields with icons and proper styling
Login page - Gold gradient submit button
Signup page - All form fields including role selector
Signup page - Proper form styling matching login page
Onboarding page - Proper padding (issue fixed)
Onboarding page - Progress bar with gold gradient
Onboarding page - Role selection with styled radio buttons
Onboarding page - Two-column grid layout for forms
Onboarding page - Glass cards for each section
Dashboard page - Stats cards with glass effect
Dashboard page - Quick actions with icons and hover effects
Dashboard page - Browse section with 6 cards grid
Dashboard page - Activity Overview section
Dashboard page - Proper alignment (issue fixed)
Theme toggle - Light/dark mode switching works correctly
Theme toggle - All components properly styled in both modes
Mobile responsiveness - Landing page adapts correctly
Mobile responsiveness - Login page centered and readable
Mobile responsiveness - Navigation compact on mobile
critical_code_review_comments: ESLint has 69 parsing errors due to missing TypeScript parser configuration - known issue but does not affect functionality
Backend is not running - this is expected as it's a frontend-only app designed to connect to external API
context_for_next_testing_agent: Frontend styling has been verified. All 'old money' aesthetic elements are properly implemented including: Cormorant Garamond serif fonts for headings, gold accents (#b8860b), glass/glassmorphism effects with backdrop-filter blur, proper dark mode support. The onboarding page padding issue and dashboard alignment issues mentioned in the original request have been fixed. Backend is not running as this is a frontend-only app.

old_money_aesthetic.serif_fonts: Cormorant Garamond used for all headings
old_money_aesthetic.color_scheme: Cream/warm tones in light mode, dark brown in dark mode

pages_tested.login_page: PASS - Centered card with glass effect
pages_tested.signup_page: PASS - Similar to login with role selector
pages_tested.onboarding_page: PASS - Proper padding, glass cards, role selection
pages_tested.dashboard_page: PASS - Stats cards, quick actions, browse section aligned
